page.description: The Alpha Five Runtime and Alpha Five Runtime+ products both allow you to run your Alpha Five applications. Runtime+ allows you to add ad-hoc reporting to your applications. The following table summarizes the differences between the two versions of the Runtime.

section.description: With Runtime+ you (i.e. the developer) can control which of your Reports, Letters and Labels can be edited by the users of your application. You can also control which of the Tables and Sets in your application can be used when users create new Reports, Letters and Labels.
